projectsData.title: DevStore: Electronic Products Store
projectsData.description: DevStore is an online store offering a wide range of electronic products, including AirPods, smartphones, and more, with a focus on quality and customer satisfaction.

projectsData.title: SoliLMS: Centralized Educational Resource Management
projectsData.description: SoliLMS is a secure, Laravel-powered platform for organizing, sharing, and tracking pedagogical documents and resources. It features intuitive categorization, role-based access, real-time usage dashboards, and automatic notifications for updates or new materials.

projectsData.title: Five Systems: Technical Installations & Maintenance
projectsData.description: Five Systems is a Moroccan company based in Tangier specializing in the design, installation, and maintenance of high-quality electrical, HVAC, plumbing, and fire safety systems for residential and commercial projects.
